item.title: LOG 1.22 Boats :)
item.description: 12th July, 2011 Hello, I hope all of you have been well. Life has improved significantly for me since I organised it. I now feel like I have a sense of purpose and

item.title: Nadiye Nadiye Kadhal Nadiye: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: The movie Rhythm has themed songs on the various elements of nature. This one is on water. The lyrics draw a comparisons between the qualities of women and and of water.

item.title: LfE 19: Work and Tea
item.description: 22/02/2010 Hello everyone, It’s been a long time since I last wrote, partly because I’ve not been doing too much of new things – the project develops, and software glitches occur daily that I patiently overcome.

item.title: Yamunai Aatrile – Lyrics and Translation
item.description: A beautiful song from Thalapathi. **Yamunai atrile ira katrile Kannanodu than aada Parvai poothida padhai parthida Pavai radhaiyo vada** In Yamuna river, in the moist air,
